Reviews are automatically processed to detect inappropriate content like fake reviews and spam. We may take down reviews that are flagged in order to comply with Google policies or legal obligations.
"Great communication and honest, fair pricing." "The cost was reasonable and the work was superior." "He is very thorough and makes sure the job is done correctly."
Michael was great. Inspected my roof and repaired...rebuilt a wall that was leaking water. Great communication and honest, fair pricing. Thank you for your help and G-d bless you and family.

Michael wants to do the best for you while not wanting to take advantage. He gave me two options and let me decide. Thank you for doing a great job! I would definitely recommend him and will use him in the future.
Michael did a fantastic job with some projects at my house. He is very thorough and makes sure the job is done correctly. I highly recommend him.
